comments:
OpenCorrespondingTaskAction can take long time to complete if id resolver would need to go to the repository for some additional metadata. In this case Eclipse UI will be blocked until remote request is completed.

Here is the stack trace:

Do you want to take this one, since it is part of rounding out the new functionality that you added?

Created an attachment (id=57238)
action now executed in background job

Mik, you have asked for it. This patch happens to be quite involved...

It seems like getActiveWindow() is null when called from within job, so I had to fix bugzilla, jira and trac connectors, so openRepositoryTask() won't fail and after that I generalized all of them and moved all that logic into the super class.

As a side effect, open repository task works for JIRA now...

Patch applied.  The generalization is definitely an improvement so its great that you did that.  I did some manual testing and fixed the case of silent failure when when the ID format was invalid so I fixed that by having the "opened" boolean set correctly and adding a message dialog to the OpenRepositoryTask action.

Rob: The case where the ID is now found has a weird message for Bugzilla, so please add this to the manual tests, i.e. Open Repository Task, enter bad ID, get reasonable message back.

(In reply to comment #4)
> Rob: The case where the ID is now found has a weird message for Bugzilla, so
> please add this to the manual tests, i.e. Open Repository Task, enter bad ID,
> get reasonable message back.

Done.
